meanings.definition: Unwilling to spend or give freely; stingy.
meanings.sent1: She was so closefisted that she never shared her snacks with anyone.
meanings.sent2: The closefisted man refused to donate even a small amount to charity.
meanings.sent3: The closefisted squirrel refused to share its nuts, even with its best friend.
meanings.sent4: His closefisted nature was like a locked treasure chest, never willing to open up.
meanings.sent5: The closefisted landlord would not even fix the leaky faucet without extra payment.

meanings.sent1: The closefisted grip of the child on the toy made it hard to take it away.
meanings.sent2: The closefisted handshake of the old man showed his strength and determination.
meanings.sent3: The closefisted cat clung to the tree branch, refusing to come down.
meanings.sent4: Her closefisted embrace around the book showed her love for reading.
meanings.sent5: The closefisted roots of the tree held firmly to the ground, resisting the storm.
